titles.title: To rename the Homestead National Monument of America near Beatrice, Nebraska, as the Homestead National Historical Park.
To rename the Homestead National Monument of America near Beatrice, Nebraska, as the Homestead National Historical Park.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.
Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 116-292.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 235.

action.text: Mr. Huffman moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1472.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary: This bill redesignates the Homestead National Monument of America in Nebraska as the "Homestead National Historical Park."
